pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 14     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(l:rare/sniffer_egg)$(item)Sniffer Eggs$() $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Torchflower seeds $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)It sniffs out and digs seeds for various unique decorative plants out of $(item)Dirt$(), $(item)Grass$(), $(item)Mud$() and $(item)Moss blocks$(). A baby sniffer is called a $(thing)Snifflet$().
